name: Darksight
description:
This game is still in development.

In the dungeon of a madman, sound is your sight. You must use that to escape.

There are currently 9 playable levels, but there will be a lot more as development continues. What's here mostly acts as a prototype of the idea, developed in my free time over a few months. There's still a lot of honing to do, as well as adding additional puzzle mechanics to make the game more interesting.

I hope you enjoy what you find! If you have any comments or constructive feedback, I'd be happy to hear it. I will be taking feedback seriously, especially bug fixes, though I do not have a strict timeline for updates at the moment.
